item.title: How can i make a safe zone? / And my fun pk not work please look
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:3, topic:242286”][quote author=supra s link=topic=318653.msg2526447#msg2526447 date=1226221953]
try something like this

public boolean dontLoose() { if(absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3228 && 3907 >= 4813 && 3922 <= 4857) sendmessage("You cant lose items in here."); return true; else return false; }

if you go to the area where you think the code mut work end you get that message it means your code works if you dont it dont work end you have to change that
[/quote]

Thats the exact same thing, just with a sendmessage.[/quote]

yes end if you go to that spot end receive the message you know that code is right end we need to have a look at the other code but most faults happen with this code line thats why i want to ask if you test it first

if(dontLoose()) { toX = 3089; toY = 3499; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sM("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(!dontLoose()) {
